name: Galaxy Ultra X Phone
description: A flagship smartphone with a stunning 6.9-inch OLED display, 108MP triple-camera system, and 5G connectivity. Powered by the latest processor for smooth performance.

name: ZenithBook Pro 16
description: A powerful 16-inch laptop with a 4K OLED screen, Intel i9 processor, 32GB RAM, and 1TB SSD. Ideal for creative professionals and gamers who demand high performance.

name: AeroBook Slim 14
description: An ultra-slim, lightweight 14-inch laptop with a Full HD display, AMD Ryzen 7 processor, and all-day battery life. Perfect for productivity and portability.
